extensionDescription.message: Extends the original 'Get' button (optionally) to 'Get/Send' and adds a popup menu with additional functions.

menuGetthis_tooltip.message: Get new messages from selected account

menuGetauth_label.message: Get messages from all auth. accounts

menuGetauth_tooltip.message: … do not ask for missing passwords!

menuSendall_tooltip.message: Send all messages out of folder Unsent

buttonSendall_tooltip.message: Send all unsent messages out of folder Unsent

pref_checkGetSendButtonAskPasswords.message: Ask for missing passwords (valid for Shift+Click too)

pref_textPasswords.message: In some cases the option to save passwords will never be shown. This can be the result of importing settings from an other mail application. Here you can re-enable the option.

pref_signonRememberSignons_label.message: Show the option to save passwords
